title: Vampire Savior
alternative_title: ヴァンパイア セイヴァー ; ヴァンパイア セイヴァー 〜魂の迷い子〜 ; Vampire Savior ~Tamashii no Mayoigo~
status: ヴァンパイア セイヴァー ; ヴァンパイア セイヴァー 〜魂の迷い子〜 ; Vampire Savior ~Tamashii no Mayoigo~
description:
Description :
        Based on the Vampire Savior installment, from the DarkStalkers video game series produced by CAPCOM. In the world of makai, there are horrible monsters that humans fear, called Darkstalkers. Lillith a fellow Darkstalker, falls to Earth ( London ) and befriends John. What will he do when he finds out what she is? Will Lillith survive Master Jedah's attacks??

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1 : The Dark Stalker Of The Shard
